message.body: Hey Gary, it's Santana. I had a question for you: Do you hire day laborers for the work that you been doing? I'm asking because I need a lil work done at my crib as well and it I was just seeing if anybody had any recommendations..?
yea, im rollin 9 deep today. what do u need done?

Nothing major. Some window work. Mainly the outside flashing cut/fitted/installed. It seals the window from the rain. I don't know how to do it myself yet. I might have some other stuff too eventually. How much is a full days work cost?
i got guys everywhere from 70/day to 150. that type of job tho i would charge per job. theyll take it cheap bc it is only a couple days work

Alright. Good to know. I potentially have quite a bit of work to do on my house but I was just trying to get an idea of what I would be working with cost wise. Eventually I need to redo my kitchen and also bathroom. I would be working side by side with anybody that was in there.
my guys are good. just let me know. if u buy materials, id work on a day rate, but if its something where u need a lot of material, they get good deals,
so i would pay they for the whole job. either way, its cheap
